name: MAPPY-LAND
description:
Mappy, the police mouse, has prepared all kinds of wonderful birthday
presents for his girlfriend, Mapico. But the big cheese in the feline
world, Nyamco , has ordered his clowder to hide the presents throughout
Mappyland. If he's going to make it to Mapico's birthday party on time,
Mappy will have to double-time it on finding those gifts! Avoid and
activate traps to knock out those crafty cats headed your way. You can
also use special items hidden in the level to distract them. Collect six
of the same presents to move on to another stage. Can Mappy make it
through all eight towns and survive the onslaught of claws?
This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. We hope you'll enjoy the new features (including off-TV play) that have been added to this title. See more Virtual Console games for Wii U.
